rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: The entrance hall doubles as a living area, featuring a welcoming aesthetic with colonial design elements. It has exposed wooden beams and vintage decor to capture the essence of the cottage style.
rooms.vastu_considerations: Focal point should be in the northeast direction for positive energy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An open dining area adjoining the living space, designed with elegant colonial furniture and ample natural light from large windows.
rooms.vastu_considerations: East facing to encourage morning sunlight.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: The kitchen is compact, well-equipped with colonial style fixtures and integrated storage. It includes state-of-the-art appliances in line with modern needs.
rooms.vastu_considerations: Placed towards the south-west to maintain balance.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office space designed with colonial elegance. It features a large window facing north for optimal lighting and minimal distraction, ensuring productivity.
rooms.vastu_considerations: North orientation to harness mental clarity.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional bathroom area with colonial fixtures. It is positioned for privacy and convenience, integrating modern plumbing solutions.
rooms.vastu_considerations: Located in the west to avoid water stagnation.

openings.description: The main entrance door is designed with colonial style detailing and placed in the northeast corner to align with Vastu for auspicious entry.
Large colonial-style window ensuring ample natural light and ventilation. It faces north to align with Vastu principles.
Window in the kitchen area providing proper ventilation and a view to encourage cooking positivity as per Vastu.
